original_title: Delain - Danse Macabre live at TivoliVredenburg
overview: Live tracks of Delain recorded at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, Netherlands, during their "Danse Macabre Tour" in 2017. The show was released with the EP "Hunters Moon" on February 22, 2019.
title: Delain - Danse Macabre live at TivoliVredenburg
